lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to control my giving and to see the results! And as a parent and grandparent of mixed race kids I really enjoy helping the "little brown people" get ahead.(ghw.Bush's term, not mine!)
lender.occupational_info: I am a disabled vet who lives on a sailboat in Latin America and I hope to visit some of Kivas clients one day soon.

lender.name: Fatma
lender.occupation: I am presently student at CIES program.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am always looking to help others.

lender.name: Kitchener Westmount
lender.loan_because: Our Rotary Club supports Kiva as one way to express the Rotary motto "Service Above Self"
lender.occupational_info: The Rotary Club of Kitchener Westmount raises funds to support our community both locally and internationally.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I know sometimes people just need a little help realizing a new business opportunity, and it feels good knowing I can provide that help.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Because it's so important.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who are making an effort to positively impact their own and their children's lives.

lender.name: suzanne
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that micro loans are the number 1 way to really help families raise their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I help the people who work in my company have better working conditions. My company is Bombardier Aerospace, we build civil airplanes (passenger ariplanes and private jets). In this company I have started a few initiatives to help people in India. Today, January 30st, 2009 I have started my Kiva life!

lender.name: Alicia
lender.occupation: Penn Medicine Development and Alumni Relations
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky and want to spread it around.
lender.occupational_info: Coordinating data.

lender.name: Edgar
lender.loan_because: I want to make a better life for others

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I find it remarkable that I would likely not notice if I had $25 missing, yet to someone else it can be life-changing. I am so very fortunate - what a great opportunity to remind me of that!
lender.occupational_info: I help organize sports leagues and tournaments for teenagers - basketball, American football (soccer), ice hockey, track and field, and a lot more. 500 high schools in the state of Minnesota are involved in this league.

lender.name: Beate
lender.loan_because: It is hard to make a living in this world. Sometimes you need a little help...

lender.name: Ivana Viani
lender.loan_because: I want to help people from all over the world achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student on the premedical track. I already have a BA in Psychology from Fairleigh Dickinson University. My research experience includes experimental, social, evolutionary, and forensic psychology, as well as political science, neuroscience and genetics. My interests are many, including reading, writing and photography, but above all I am committed to leaving this world a better place than that which I was born into.

lender.name: Jinny and Jesse
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are in need and make the world a better place one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to make sure their medications are right for them, effective, safe, and easy for them to take.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: so little can mean so much
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student.

lender.name: Woody Adams
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you do what you love, then you will find someone to pay you for it. I also believe that we are all connected. We are responsible for one another and I'm able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers to make their lives better.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I'm bored.

lender.name: Sanjida
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired former public servant who contracts part-time to the Australian Federal government.

lender.name: Shari Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to see other people be able to prosper as I've been allowed to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the mother of two fantastic little boys, Jake and Dex, and when I'm not chasing them around I'm working toward a medical degree. Busy, busy.

lender.name: Whitney
lender.loan_because: Small graduate stipend at work!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Psychology Ph.D. student. I study how we learn, think, and navigate around our world.

lender.name: Jade
lender.loan_because: I am committed to do my part - in whatever small way I can.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: I Think That Everybody Should Have The Opportunity To Follow There Dreams And Make Them A Reality. We Have The Chance To Make A Difference In Someoneâ€™s Life, Why Not Take It!
lender.occupational_info: I Help Train U.S. Soldiers To Prepare Themselves For Combat.

lender.name: Phyllis & Bob
lender.loan_because: A friend, who shares our opinions and values, gave us a gift.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired university professors active in non-profit organizations who work for peace and justice. We are happy to have helped to elect President Barack Obama so America can return to being a force for good in the world !!

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: of a family members inspirational christmas message.
lender.occupational_info: I work in home remodeling.

lender.name: Ayal
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.

lender.name: Marley
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women across the world. All mothers want a better life for their children and if I can, in a small way, help them, I'm helping all children.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a mother who is raising two sons and trying to make the world a better place through small changes.

lender.name: Jake, Tess, Timon & Lori
lender.loan_because: We want to help needy people with a 'hand up,' not a 'hand out.'
lender.occupational_info: We are your humble partners.

lender.name: gina
lender.loan_because: we are all brothers and sisters
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are going through problems or have mental illness.

lender.name: Kabeer
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: it empowers others.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: To help fledgling businesses in the developing world and profit.
lender.occupational_info: System Engineer, and a neophyte investor

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women with a mind for business. KIVA allows me to make loans I can afford in areas where the money will have a large relative impact.
lender.occupational_info: I raise honeybees and sell the honey and beeswax in order to support my disabled husband and four children. I also make soap, handcream, and lipbalm from the honey and beeswax, which I also sell.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: ... because I can! I spent 2 months in Nicaragua in 1999, learning Spanish and staying with families in San Juan del Sur, Granada, EstelÃ­ and Managua. I visited many small-scale development projects, where I saw how local women's enterprises can help everyone in their community.

lender.name: heather
lender.loan_because: this was given as a gift to me at christmas and i am now able to provide a gift to someone else who is trying to make a better live for themselves and others
lender.occupational_info: i work in a very busy acute care hospital on a floor with patient who have problems with their brain or spinal cord,car accidents or tumors

lender.name: Bryant
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Sophomore at Marist College

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have an abundance of the necessities of life and have been on the receiving end of generosity. I want to "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I teach meditation to help people cope with the stresses of life.

lender.name: wube
lender.loan_because: My loan amount that I give can be spent on a couple of Starbucks coffee cups, and it feels good to see how people in the rest of the world use to survive.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Money that I'm not using should be out doing some good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm training to be the kind of Officer who cares about his soldiers, their families and the ones he's sent to protect.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: My wife did this. Then she died. I'm keeping up her good work.
lender.occupational_info: Old, feeble, retired.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think that micro lending is a significant way to help people around the world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I'm a bad person and doing something nice like this is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I sit around on a computer and help people on the phone with their problems.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I like helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: 9th grade stuff

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I'm not living paycheck to paycheck anymore.
lender.occupational_info: I make coffee and sell food. Also, I sell handmade paper goods online.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in the growth of their businesses which will in turn bring prosperity to the local area.
lender.occupational_info: Not only do I build computers, but I'm also starting my own business with Chews-4-Health. www.chews4health.com/28162

lender.name: Melvin
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: of the wonderful things it does.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I believe that I can help others in something else than IT ...
lender.occupational_info: I'm supporting a large IT/IS infrastructure for a Norvegian Company in France.

lender.name: Franc
lender.loan_because: we are all one!

lender.name: Valentina
lender.loan_because: we all must have the same opportunity

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to share some resources, hoping that the entrepreneurs will have an opportunity that would otherwise not be available to them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a USA expatriate living and working in Kuala Lumpur.

lender.name: Computor Tutor
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to use technology (computers, digital cameras, iPods, smart phones, etc).

lender.name: Anu Johanna
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: michaela
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I know what its like to start a business with very little money
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a career that suits them, or a better career.

lender.name: Elizabeth & Paul
lender.loan_because: We asked our parents if we could use some of our Christmas and Birthday money to help others that need help. So here we are : o )
lender.occupational_info: Elizabeth is in 4rd grade and enjoys being on the YMCA swim team. Paul is in 1st grade and likes basketball and swimming with his family. Everyone enjoys board games and puzzles in the winter. :o)

lender.name: John and Helen
lender.occupation: Loans for livestock or sewing projects
lender.loan_because: we believe that the poor need to be empowered to make a living of their choice. We believe in sustainability and transformational development as the mode. It's awesome to see joy on their faces when THEY realize they can succeed. There's nothing quite like it to see them realize that they are supporting their families through their own effort and no longer rely on "hand-outs" or doing without.
lender.occupational_info: We visit small, rural communities in Nicaragua weekly - create relationships - find what talents and resources they have - and inquire what they would like to do to become sustainable. Then we help them gather what they need, provide a loan, and continue to encourage them as they begin to repay it. We enjoy seeing their lives transformed!

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: My husband and I want to do whatever little we can to make a positive difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.occupation: small business owner, college professor, pastor

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make a positive difference in someones life
lender.occupational_info: i am part owner of a company that sells industrial equipment

lender.name: Bronwen
lender.loan_because: I want to help decrease WorldSuck. I also like knowing where my money goes to and seeing the results of my loans is amazing!

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business.
lender.occupational_info: I sell cosmetic raw materials to small businesses and hobbyists.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur at heart...I love the thought of someone making something from nothing, of turning that "sow's ear" into that "silk purse"...I love the thought of people working towards bettering their position in life, rather than accepting a handout. " Give a (wo)man a fish, and he/she'll eat for a day, teach a (wo)man to fish and he/she will eat for life. Let's help create more 'fisherpeople' in the world together!
lender.occupational_info: I distribute pc and macintosh computer software, computer games, computer accessories and video game accessories to retail stores all across Canada.

lender.name: sam
lender.loan_because: I respect people using their entrepreneurial abilities to better their lives and those of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that property assets are performing well and that the money spent on enhancing them is used effectively. I also sell products online.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: I teach biology at a small liberal arts college, and study reptiles and amphibians

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe responsible peer to peer social capitalism is one road that will lead to world trust and peace. I want to be an ever increasing part of that mission. Kiva provides me with one method of doing so!

lender.name: Hans-Georg
lender.loan_because: I have to support the poorer people in the world. It was a great luck to be born in the first world.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: "Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons" - Woody Allen

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I want people to feel better and not suffer in this world
lender.occupational_info: Working on helping people find a balance as to their health on the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual level

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people raise food for their own communities and be able to get an education.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: it's fun to be able to help make a difference in places I may never see and in the lives of people I will probably never meet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom, a grandmom,a pastor in the United Church of Christ. and a Seeing Eye puppy raiser!

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: I loan because I like the idea of helping someone along the path of their dreams by offering them gentle encouragement. Micro loans are a way of saying, "I believe in you. You can do it."
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand tax laws and how the law impacts the choices they make when they earn, spend, and invest.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people a little bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: As a planner I'm involved with many projects that have a county-wide impact. I help determin if the impacts are good or bad.

lender.name: Anam
lender.loan_because: otherwise I'd spend it on drugs.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much and I wanna share some of that with people who need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: it is a good idea to help other people to help themselves

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It seems I can help lots of people with minimal risk.
lender.occupational_info: Boring federal work. You try managing federal employees!

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: we all need help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I run life insurance illustrations for a company that designs death and retirement benefits.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for businesses.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professional bum.

lender.name: Jada
lender.loan_because: I care about entrepreneurs all over the world who have trouble starting their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to learn and love life.

lender.name: SLIDE at UCLA
lender.loan_because: Student Lenders in Developing Economies (SLIDE) is a UCLA student group dedicated to raising funds for microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: We plan and host fundraisers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can. I had lots of goals in 2009, and this was one one them.
lender.occupational_info: As an engineer I solve complex problems which hardly anyone can fathom. As an educator of Chihuahua's, I am constantly inventing and perfecting hand and voice signaling techniques which render this breed powerless to disobey my commands.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I want to..

lender.name: Suzie
lender.loan_because: I'm kind of gung ho about empowerment, social justice, and love how microfinancing brings those two together :)
lender.occupational_info: I do client development, which means research prospective clients for our company (www.axiomlaw.com), emailing them, calling them, meeting with them, and getting business! $$$

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I think it's a really amazing way to help people that want help but isn't looking for a handout. Kiva is amazing!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers as a manager and a coder.

lender.name: Bradfield
lender.loan_because: connecting with and helping others is a great way to make the world a smaller and better place
lender.occupational_info: I'm a climate scientist

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I get such a great return on so little.
lender.occupational_info: Residential construction

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-loans will be the key factor in creating independence in developing nations - ending "aid" from developed nations which fuels corruption and lack of self-esteem. It will change the world.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I've never seen an more succinct method of reaching out to help people directly...
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and writer, I paint in oil paints, write short stories and film scripts. I work at various other "normal" jobs to pay the rent, while I "do" art and "philosophize" ;)

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have an opportunity to have a decent life.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and care for my house and family, and volunteer in several groups.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: every little bit can help
lender.occupational_info: i work as a cook in restaurant.

lender.name: Tod Maffin
lender.loan_because: It's important to help families around the world grow and prosper.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: There are people trying to make a difference, trying to help themselves and others as well, but it's never that simple. I want to make just a bit easier for them.
lender.occupational_info: I am primarily a student, in high school, planning on going to college. I also have a part-time job making pizzas at a pizzeria

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people and allow them to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a before and after school child care program, which means that I work with kids ranging in age from 5 to 12 all day.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and that everyone should be given a chance to obtain their life goals. Kiva is a great organization that makes this happen.

lender.name: Melaina
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help. If I can help one person make their life better then I feel privileged to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I help make books and articles easier to read; I ensure that all of the information is accurate in content and correct in grammar and style.

lender.name: Sue & Ric
lender.loan_because: I started my business with a small loan and was consided high risk. If it was not for that loan, I would not be where I am. I want to help other accompish their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I put picture and infofmation on paper. this help them sell there products.

lender.name: Dena
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: As a female I picture myself in another femaleâ€™s shoe. In every country the hardship of being a female is sometimes a burden. I feel the Adversity of all the women who are trying hard to provide for her family. I feel that god put every individual for a mission. As much as I want to give, I can only give as much as I can. Bless
lender.occupational_info: People like me are seeking to lend a hand out as much as they can.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been in the situation of needing only a little bit of money. Trying to get it from traditional sources is challenging and has large financial consequences.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and support the servers and technology within the company.

lender.name: dina
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a bit of help at one time or another
lender.occupational_info: i teach people about art

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because:
I'm an entrepreneur.
Being in business for oneself is empowering.
Skills learned in business are life skills.
Building a successful business takes commitment, dedication, and a drive to succeed.
Being successful in business creates dignity, self-esteem and most importantly, options.

lender.name: Lisa & Mark
lender.occupational_info: Mark is a self employed carpenter. Lisa works in a public school library. Charlie, Cedric and Annamarie are students.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: of the peace it brings to my soul. Though my struggles may be different from these entrepreneurs, the internal journey is the same. We all want to be at peace. We all want to be happy. My hope is that my loans empower these individuals to empower themselves. I am constantly inspired.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. There are so many good people that just need someone to believe in them and give them an opportunity. I think Kiva is wonderful and allows people to follow their dreams and keep their pride. My initial loan has paid back more than 10 fold and allows me to reloan every time a monthly payment comes in. Kiva is also a great opportunity to have a direct positive impact on someone else's life and a wonderful opportunity to get your children involved in giving. It really helps them realize how fortunate they are. I let them read bios and pick out who they would like to loan money to. They can see first hand how many people their loans can help and when their loans are paid back, they can select another individual to loan to.
lender.occupational_info: Be the change you want to see in the world.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.occupational_info: Soy estudiante

lender.name: Sher
lender.loan_because: It's a way to show appreciation for the opportunities I've had.
lender.occupational_info: I write instructions for how to do things, like use machinery or computer software.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: A life centered on yourself isn't worth living.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help others world wide who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: A single person and a small gift can make a huge impact in the world. Everyone just has to do something and Kiva makes it easy.
lender.occupational_info: Bringing people and organizations together to build community.

lender.name: Kat and John
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. When people help each other, it spreads friendship around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children to save resources in our area schools. We need to protect the earth and respect it. My husband builds computer controlled machines that make steel products.

lender.name: Matt G.
lender.loan_because: The free flow of small-scale credit is an incredibly effective way to bring about change in many places.
lender.occupational_info: I am spending one year as a researcher in the cognitive neuroscience of language, after which I will be starting law school at Harvard.

lender.name: Ian Maravalli
lender.loan_because: ...AS IF SOMETHING WAS BROKEN IN THE WORLD WE WERE SUPPOSED TO HOLD OUR PALMS AGAINST THE WOUND." - BLUE LIKE JAZZ - DONALD MILLER
lender.occupational_info: i am an unemployed traveler that is about to attend university

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can see the impact I directly have on peoples lives. Anyway in the 1st world we have too much money and a small part of it can change someone's life (and their family's).
lender.occupational_info: green energy

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I want to understand what's happening in the world, and help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am on the Board of Directors of Veggielution Community Farm, a nonprofit that empowers youth and adults from diverse backgrounds to create a sustainable food system in San Jose. Our urban farm engages the community by providing access to healthy and local food, creating youth leadership opportunities, and developing creative solutions to social and environmental justice issues.
